title: N403 Yum Yum - Deasley in Legendary Auction
author: ValKehl

posts.post_title: N403 Yum Yum - Deasley in Legendary Auction
posts.post_content:
I'm wondering if a Net 54 member won this card (lot #1025) in the last Legendary Auction.  I was the underbidder on this card, as I wanted this Washington player for my type-card collection instead of my current Yum Yum type card of Danny Richardson of the New Yourk team.  If the winner of this Deasley card would happen to rather have a Richardson card in comparable condition instead, perhaps we can work a trade.  I prefer an email to a PM.
Val Kehl
[url]ekehl333@aol.com[/url]
